response.original_title: The Snow is Singing हिउँको गीत
response.overview: A Bhutanese refugee family in a Midwestern US town is torn apart when the grandparents' buried traumatic past of ethnic cleansing and cultural exile haunts their 8-year-old grandson Ishir, forcing them to confront the truth and reunite to reclaim their identity and shared strength.
response.tagline: In a quiet Midwestern town, a buried past resurfaces—forcing a family to face the truth, heal old wounds, and reclaim who they are.
response.title: The Snow is Singing हिउँको गीत
